item.name: \Microsoft\Windows\Active Directory Rights Management Services Client\AD RMS Rights Policy Template
item.creator: Microsoft Corporation

item.name: \Microsoft\Windows\Active Directory Rights Management Services Client\AD RMS Rights Policy Template
item.creator: Microsoft Corporation

item.name: Administrators
item.description: Administrators have complete and unrestricted access to the computer/domain

item.name: Backup Operators
item.description: Backup Operators can override security restrictions for the sole purpose of backing up or restoring files

item.name: Cryptographic Operators
item.description: Members are authorized to perform cryptographic operations.

item.name: Distributed COM Users
item.description: Members are allowed to launch, activate and use Distributed COM objects on this machine.

item.name: Event Log Readers
item.description: Members of this group can read event logs from local machine

item.name: Guests
item.description: Guests have the same access as members of the Users group by default, except for the Guest account which is further restricted

item.name: IIS_IUSRS
item.description: Built-in group used by Internet Information Services.

item.name: Network Configuration Operators
item.description: Members in this group can have some administrative privileges to manage configuration of networking features

item.name: Performance Log Users
item.description: Members of this group may schedule logging of performance counters, enable trace providers, and collect event traces both locally and via remote access to this computer

item.name: Performance Monitor Users
item.description: Members of this group can access performance counter data locally and remotely

item.name: Power Users
item.description: Power Users are included for backwards compatibility and possess limited administrative powers

item.name: Remote Desktop Users
item.description: Members in this group are granted the right to logon remotely

item.name: Replicator
item.description: Supports file replication in a domain

item.name: Users
item.description: Users are prevented from making accidental or intentional system-wide changes and can run most applications

item.name: Driver da Microsoft para arquivos texto (*.txt; *.csv)
Driver para o Microsoft Visual FoxPro

item.name: IKEEXT

item.name: UmRdpService

item.name: wercplsupport
